attributes.action: i would like to raise a petition for Ukrainians
attributes.additional_details: their safety is in grave danger if they remain in a worn torn country from aggression from Russian federation, remaining in a such a country with have detrimental effects to their health and life and will break their freedom and democracy
attributes.background: petition for Ukrainians living in the UK to be able to grant their close relatives refugee status to save their lives from Russian aggressor

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Allow Ukrainians with family in the UK to enter the UK without a visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609397
